prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon that resembles a creature with a shell made of boulders.
Show me a Pokemon with a sturdy appearance that can thrive in rocky terrains.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a massive stone shell and powerful claws for digging.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the essence of a mountain dweller with a unique shell.
Give me a Pokemon that looks like it can withstand harsh environments and has earthy tones.
Generate a creature that has a rock-like exterior and blends into its rocky habitat.
Make a Pokemon that has a rugged appearance and is adept at navigating rocky landscapes.
